original_text: He is clothed in a robe dipped in blood, and the name by which he is called is The Word of God.
korean_text: 또 그가 피 뿌린 옷을 입었는데 그 이름은 하나님의 말씀이라 칭하더라

sentences.original_text: He is clothed in a robe dipped in blood
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 피에 적신 도포를 입고 있다

sentences.original_text: the name by which he is called is The Word of God
